page.title: 15LAW AND ORDER
page.content: THE POLICE STATION IN BRORA IS THE SAME SIZE AS A 3 BEDROOM SEMI-DETACHED HOUSE. IN THIS AREA WE HAVE 3 POLICE STATIONS BRORA, HELMSDALE AND GOLSPIE. BRORA IS THE HEAD OFFICE. THERE ARE 2 CELLS IN BRORA,1 IN HELMSDALE AND 1 IN GOLSPIE.IN BRORA THERE ARE 4 POLICE CONSTABLES AND A SERGEANT. THE SERGEANT IS CALLED MR.SMART. IN HELMSDALE THERE ARE 2 CONSTABLES AND IN GOLSPIE THERE ARE 3. THEY HAVE TO DO MANY INTERESTING JOBS WHICH ALL INCLUDE DEALING WITH THE PUBLIC . HELPING PEOPLE WHO ARE LOST , WHO HAVE BEEN INJURED IN CAR ACCIDENTS, FINALLY CATCHING THIEVES,CONTROLING TRAFFIC BUT MAINLY THEIR JOB IS TO BE THERE TO HELP AND ADVISE THE PUBLIC.THE SERGEANT LIKES HIS JOB BECAUSE HE MEETS LOTS OF INTERESTING PEOPLE AND EACH DAY BRINGS THE UNEXPECTED .IT IS NEVER BORING.
